casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC INSTRUCTION, et al. 429P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Richard B. Harper, Attorney at Law, Sylva, for Brown, Jacquelyn. Donna B. Wojcik, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Public Instruction (Macon County Schools), et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of December 2017 by Plaintiff in the Alternative to Consider Petition for Discretionary Review a Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
